item.title: [Microservices][Tracing system] Getting started with Zipkin , Spring Sleuth
item.description: when I use this tracing system , is a problem of request latency happened , or there is a internal server error ,and I don’t know where to find it , and monitor daily performance . learning resource : http://cloud.spring.io/spring-cloud-static/spring-cloud-sleuth/1.2.0.RELEASE/ http://zipkin.io/ http://opentracing.io/ my git repo https://github.com/weichou1229/zipkin-practice Brief of contents Why need tracing ? What is a Trace ? Approach by spring lib test scenario description prepare test environment test result Conclusion Appendix

item.title: spring boot + spring data mongoDB + spring data rest
item.description: 使用spring framework來建立server-api app, spring boot + spring data mongoDB + spring data rest Table of contents Table of contents 1. create POM file 2. create Domain class 3. create DAO interface 4. create app entry 5. configure Repository Rest Configuration 1. create

Deploy a MongoDB step Launch a mongoDB create db create collection Launch a mongoDB docker run --name mongo -d -p 27017:27017 -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=mongo -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=secret mongo:3 --smallfiles create db
